name: Slide Zero
description:
Welcome to the ultimate math puzzle game! Are you ready to put your math skills to the test with challenging puzzles? Look no further!

In this game, you'll control a group of numbered tiles and use your strategic thinking to place them in the correct sequence of mathematical operations. From addition and subtraction to multiplication and division, you'll need to use your mathematical prowess to reach the desired result.

But be warned, this game gets progressively harder as you advance through each level. You'll need to plan ahead and strategically place the tiles to solve each puzzle. Luckily, you won't be restricted by time limits, so you can take as long as you need to solve each challenge.

This game is not only a great way to improve your math skills but also an incredibly fun and addictive pastime. The tiles move together with each swipe, adding an extra layer of strategy to the game.

The best part? This game is completely free to play! However, if you'd like to support the game's development and help us create more exciting levels for you to enjoy, you can make a donation.

Don't wait any longer, download the game now and put your math skills to the test!

Currently the game has 71 levels and more to come! Your generous support will speed up the process.

Looking for even more challenges and exclusive content? Consider following and subscribing to our Patreon page, where you'll get access to new levels, behind-the-scenes content, and more! Your support helps us continue creating fun and engaging games for you to enjoy.

Checkout Slide Zero's Patreon.
